document_data.name: Gharl
document_data.mainbody: '''Gharl''' was a [[human]] man and the War Lord of [[Nimoar's Hold]] (which would later become [[Waterdeep]]).
document_data.Personality: Gharl was a standoffish man, but was determined and loyal to his people, viewing it as his duty to protect the people of Nimoar's Hold at any cost.
document_data.Possessions: He was known to possess a ''[[javelin of lightning]]''.
document_data.History:
Gharl spent much of his life engaged in warfare.{{Cite adventurers league/Hero of the Troll Wars|12}} He obtained the position in [[936 DR]] when War Lord [[Nimoar]] the Reaver died. Previously, Gharl had been Nimoar's best general.

In the {{YearlinkName|940}}, Gharl ordered his men to light the fields outside of the [[Trollwall]] on fire to halt the advance of [[troll]]s. Meanwhile, he used his ''javelin of lightning'' to hold a number of trolls at bay.{{Cite adventurers league/Hero of the Troll Wars|4}}
